column4: i dist-upgraded from breezy to dapper yesterday, now startx fails... i removed glcore from xorg.conf, as i suspected a nvidia-driver issue, but i still get an error. typing X on the console starts X11, but not the gdm. i am not at the box right now, but do you have any hints or ideas?
i'll try vesa then... i used nv instead of nvidia, but that didn't help
if you're using custom res stuff, you may find it's been trashed or that the driver has changed it's detection routines and is overriding youer settings
